website_summaries.verdict: Complete set of easy readers that builds confidence as your child progresses.
pros: Helps beginning readers get started and advance
Builds from single words on a page to complete sentences with complex words and long vowels
Designed for sight word learning, but extremely easy to apply phonetically
cons: Once your child gets the hang of it, they will move through them very quickly

customer_reviews.title: Terrible! It is much smaller than original Bob Books!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old daughter has the first set and she loves it. So I ordered the whole set from this vendor. But when I received this weekend, my daughter and I are totally disappointed because they are tiny small palm-sized books and its size is only about 1/4 of the original BOB BOOKS!! There is no description of the book size online. It is definitely not worthy of the money. We will definitely return of it.
customer_reviews.author: Bin Y.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be stupid buy bob books!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t have bob books you’ll regret every day you waited wondering if you should buy them. Don’t be late to the party like I was and get bob books! Early reading with reading concepts incorporated into them. Better than sight word books, easier and faster memorization of letters and sounds than learning using ABC phonic memorization. My 4 year old and 6 year old (who has a speech delay) and comprehending reading at rapid paces after starting bob books. They do the work for you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Turki

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are both avid readers and our boys love to sit and listen to us read every day. Our 5 year old started working his way through these when he was in Pre-K. They are really great books and helped him learn to read very quickly. They are arranged to build on what they already know and they have good use of repetition and similar words. I CAN NOT recommend these highly enough. We have the ENTIRE Bob collection and now our 4 year old is starting to read using these!
customer_reviews.author: V Clark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent reading tools!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter in Kindergarten to use with her reading tutor. In three months she is now at a second grade reading level! A good investment and I figure I can use with my younger son too. These are the smaller books as described but there are a lot (about 10) in each box and the kids like completing a book and moving on to the next one. Plus each book has reminders as to which words produce which sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Best books for 3-7years , learning w fun
customer_reviews.text: Best books for children , preschool, kindergarten, 1&2 grades! All my grandchildren, and great grandchildren love them Small for their hands, loaded w learning, but they do not know, they think it’s just fun I ordered for my 2 grandsons, found out they were ahead of the ones I ordered, so I am returning a Nd have ordered the older ones
customer_reviews.author: K. Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: These helped my 4 yr old begin reading
customer_reviews.text: These are nice short books that help with teaching blends and have lots of short beginner words. I used these to help my 4yr old son start to read and he is able to do 1-3 books in a sitting before loosing interest lol The way the books use the same few blends over and over makes them good practice especially with kids who aren't picking reading up at a fast pace. I think these helped my son's confidence as well since he was able to say he read the whole book by himself. He now even picks them up on his own and is able to sound out the words as is proud of himself.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful books to use for kids of all ages. They're separated by volume and the kids really do love engaging with them. I totally recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Segura

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: My son just turned 5 and is flying through these books. They teach reading so well. I am happy with these books and would recommend them to anyone wanting to help their child learn to read.
customer_reviews.author: WhitCool

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend these books
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed on how my son easily learns to read with these books. The good thing he knew his letter sounds before reading them which made it a bit easy for him. I bought stickers so when he reads a book if he gets it right I give him stickers on the cover of the book. He loves cars so I get car stickers. This also motivates him to read.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Conteh

customer_reviews.title: A definitely must for beginner readers
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this set in his classroom, so we decided to purchase the entire set for home to be consistent. He reads several books from one of the boxes at least once a days and you can definitely tell his vocabulary is picking up tremendously-he is only 5 and reading at almost a first grade level already.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Not full size or quality
customer_reviews.text: Know that these are tiny, paper and not the original thickness or quality. The price should be much lower considering all of this. They also took much longer to arrive than the stated promised arrival date. I would return them but my daughter ripped the first book set box when trying to open it. Super thin paper and box.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: My son was falling behind on reading. This definitely ...
customer_reviews.text: My son was falling behind on reading. This definitely helped him get caught up. We gradually went up a set or "level" .
customer_reviews.author: selene

customer_reviews.title: Good books to help the learning processes
customer_reviews.text: Great start up set. Kid really liked reading with them
customer_reviews.author: Caballero Pegaso

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. I bought all 5 sets because it was cheaper than buying the 4 sets I needed separately. These books are great
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: great phonics and sight words
customer_reviews.text: did great with 5 year old not yet kindergarten. 3.5 year old picked up really quickly just being a round for the lessons not directed at him.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Great Way to Teach Reading to Little Ones
customer_reviews.text: I used the Bob books for teaching my own kids who are voracious readers as adults. I ordered a new set to work with the grandkids and am achieving equal success. An excellent teaching source.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Michener Bockert

customer_reviews.title: Great for a re school teacher
customer_reviews.text: These books are exactly what I was looking for. Perfect for beginning readers. Super fast shipping too.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Reading
customer_reviews.text: Love Bob books. Granddaughter is excited to read them perfect for beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: wonderful way to learn to reaf
customer_reviews.text: best books to help little ones learn to read, both my kids learned reading ftom this and now my niece enjoyed them too.....
customer_reviews.author: Living N Loving❤️

customer_reviews.title: Learning to read
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is being home schooled. These are a wonderful tool for learning to read.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Bob books
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved these books. My son is only 4 years old and is reading them and enjoying them so much definitely purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These books a great to help with learning to read! Very glad I have them!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are in great condition. I believe they will help my granddaughter learn to read.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Great for start up readings
customer_reviews.text: Great for start up readings. But had a bad experience with the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Sulagna

customer_reviews.title: Bob's Books
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my four year old grandson so his mother (our daughter) could start helping him to read. She used Bob's books with our granddaughter and they helped her out a lot!
customer_reviews.author: James K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Teach
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson is 5 yrs. old n reads these in school so when I gave them to him he was so excited to show me how he reads them!! Very Good learning to read books!! Awesome
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great starter books
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been struggling. These books are done so well to help with beginners trying to read. It has helped a lot.

customer_reviews.title: Encourages reading for pleasure
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves these books and will pick them up to read on her own.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic ! I have a Kindergarten child and needed to start working at home and she loves these week one. Now reading them to her brother
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Peters

customer_reviews.title: perfect for starter reasers.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy to have these books at home to go with the ones they are using at school.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno j

customer_reviews.title: Great for encouraging reading
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love these books. Their reading has really improved.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than normal.
customer_reviews.text: These are much smaller than the regular bob books purchased at Target or Costco.

customer_reviews.title: I would like to get the right books sent please
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong books. My son was so hurt

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great books they have helped my son a lot highly recommended

customer_reviews.text: Great books for all 3 of my grandsons. Books are small....(4×5 maybe), but would definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome! After 2 months our 5 year old is ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! After 2 months our 5 year old is on the third set of books. We catch him sounding out words on his own when we are out shopping. These have really propelled his interest and ability to read.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Ortner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love theses books and my daughter as well. Very good book to start reading.
customer_reviews.author: jory28
